newsitem.title: UK: Bankers Trust prices British university stg bond.
newsitem.headline: Bankers Trust prices British university stg bond.

text.p: Bankers Trust International said on Friday it priced the 48 million stg structured 29-year bond launched in the name of Varsity Funding (Holdings) Ltd and guaranteed by Financial Security Assurance.
The issue was previously given as 49 million stg.
Bankers Trust would only say that the deal has got underlying university-linked notes.

Bankers Trust vice-president head of Eurobond syndication Vincent Keith told Reuters: "It's a grey box structure. People know that the underlying notes are university obligations secured by prime university properties. Beyond that it's wrapped by FSA."

WHEN IT WILL BE FIXED AT 8.792 PCT UNTIL MATURITY.
AMORTISES FROM 2007. AVERAGE LIFE IS 22.37 YEARS.
